main.name: Willy Mello
main.description: I am incredibly interested in the building apps with social and recreational utility. I have experience working with React, React-Native, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, PostsgreSQL and Firebase. I love fishing, snowboarding and sailing.
main.bio: I am a graduate of Fullstack Acacemy in NYC; former enthusiastic educator with a combined 6 years of teaching, coaching, and mentorship experience at a public school in Montana and and independent school in New Jersey. I love fishing, snowboarding, sailing, and bouldering

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: 4 year varsity wrestler, local middleschool tutor, weekend fisherman

work.title: Teacher, Coach and Housemaster
work.description: Taught AP US History and Global Issues. Integrated primary source analysis, effective class discussions and  project-based learning into course syllabi. Served as live-in housemaster of West Hall for 26 students. Led practices, managed travel, and coached team resulting in a #1 high school wrestling program ranking in the USA.

work.title: Teacher and 3 Sport Coach
work.description: Taught 6th, 7th, and 8th grade students English and History. Coached high school and middle school wrestling, track and football.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Willy Mello must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
